text: The Gemenc Grand Prix is a cycling race held annually in Hungary. It was part of UCI Europe Tour in category 2.2 from 2005 to 2009 and back again in the same category in 2017. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccccff;" !Year !Winner !Second
